item_category: Go beyond with Nokia 5.3. The incredible quad camera lets you push the boundaries of photography. You can transport yourself to another world with the mega 6.55" screen. And you can say goodbye to battery anxiety with 2-day battery life. Plus, handle any task at speed with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 processor and latest Android 10 operating system - which gets better with every software upgrade for 2 years.

review_text: All good works well look good to
Does the same as any other phone accept it's a good price and worth the buy
Fab phone easy to use.

Just needed a replacement for broken Android phone. This fitted the bil. I am not on my phone all the time but need it tio keep up to date with technology i.e. shopping snd travel apps. Good price for lower end of the market phone
Just using it and still loving it ,not found any reason to fault or dislike yet so far so good it’s a good phone and easy to use also setting up was easy .

For an entry-level smartphone it does everything I need to use it for. It's probably on a par with the top-level smartphones from a couple of years ago though. My last phoned bricked after nearly three years use and this appeared to be the best value for <£150. The only thing letting it down really is that it had a 1.5GB update to apply, so it took a few hours before I could actually use it. That tends to be the norm these days so no big issue.

I brought it for my father who is not much familiar with phone or technology, normally he just use some IM app or normal call. It was the perfect gift for him. Not that much expensive and do it's job.
I am happy to see Nokia coming back to the Market with new technology. I am happy to see and using Nokia. Affordable price. Easy to use. I recommend other to use Nokia.
It's good, bigger than expected but seems to do what I want from a phone. Different layout to my previous non Nokia which took a while to get used too.
Great phone and really good camera.

Plus points:
 * In terms of CPU and RAM, this is an amazing phone for the price.
 * Large screen.
 * Thin profile, fits nicely in pocket.
 * Camera is surprisingly good in low lighting.

Bad points:
 * Proximity sensor is faulty.
 * No gyro sensor.
 * Camera is very poor with indoor lighting.
 * Battery life rubbish after 6 months.
 * Case and screen have become damaged when the phone has never been mishandled, stopping a warranty claim.
Everything I ever wanted in a phone and more.
Best phone from Nokia

Only had a week but so far so good. Decent camera and all my apps work. Great for not so tech savvy people who just want a smart phone to use as phone and basic messaging services instead of watching films and playing games!
Excellent phone all round . Very happy
This a product very good
I haven’t used it yet but my friend recommended it they have used it it’s better than Samsung

No smartphone is simple, but this one does the basic things you need without the cost of more complex offerings with functions you don't need and won't use. 
It was chosen was for the size of screen, which is amongst the largest available on the market at this price, with the aim to run easily seen navigation apps. In this respect it works well, although at this early stage, it is hard to compare the GPS performance with previous phones, hence four stars not five so far. Good value overall.
This phone does everything you need
It's easy to use I been using for few months now it's nice phone
Not a very good device,blocks, freezes
Batttery lasts long. Worth for the money.
Nice phone quick and easy to set up

Another good phone from Nokia. Biggest plus is that it runs Android 1 firmware so no 'bloatware' apps added by the manufacturer that slow other phones. Does everything that you need at a good price. Only let-down is the lack of fast charging, only a problem if you're a really heavy user. The battery will last most people well over a day.

Not as good as my old Moto G5
I bought this as change to Moto and the comparible Moto didn't have many good reviews. 
I have had to reset my finger twice no in only a week
 And that in itself is no easy task. 

I will be.lookingnto change sooner rather than later. 
The only good thing is the battery life.
The phone was easy to set up and use.  Really please with its functions great phone for the price.  Haven't found any negatives so far. Really pleased with it.

I looked at the reviews on several different sites, which all gave good reviews. Some went into too much technical jargon for me. I like the weight, the size. The camera is great for me and most of all it’s easy to use. I didn’t want it to be anything more than be reliable when I needed it to be.
Great phone and the battery lasts longer.
Great store to find what do you need online. Great products to buy and suit your needs,
Super amazing and fabulous

I've always had my kids castoffs before. This phone is good size, lovely sharp screen and excellent battery life. Great value for money, and dual SIM is a bonus so I only have to carry one device for work and personal use.
Easy to set up.  Good functionality.  Why spend more?
This is a great phone everything transferred easy great battery easy to use and can go days before charging again very happy

I had smashed the screen of my precious phone and the cost of a new screen was the same as this phone. It is great to have a stripped down Android version without the bloatware that comes on most phones. It runs smoothly and is great value. It won't match top end phones but for what I need it is perfect and a great colour too.
Quite empress with the Nokia slick design and nice and quick response, still getting use to the navigation differences from my LG. Had a Nokia years ago certainly an improvement on that.

Generally a good phone having now been on my third phone in over a year. Good points  has headphone socket, distinctive colour, large screen. As a phone connects to web easily, takes clear images. So if you aren't too caught up in staying with specific manufacturers this is a strong alternative to your last phone.
Negs: Too large to fit in jeans pocket, without doubt cheaper to throw away than repair. Its' weight is very noticeable which is a drag.
Good budget phone...
The phone i bought, hangs a lot and applications stopped forcefully. Not happy with the product.

I've had Nokia mobiles for decades and they always provide me with suitable service.
Yes, there are a plethora of choices of mobiles but I chose this phone because it's a reasonable price; under £200 and performs well for my purposes.
With heavy use the battery lasts two days, then takes approximately 1.5 hours to recharge.
Screen size is just right, it's slim and looks good in Cyan.
Screen clarity is good with reasonable camera's and navigation through the phone is trouble free.
This was a replacement phone as the previous one battery died after 5 months. This one seams ok at the moment.
I liked this Nokia which I bought it's got plenty of memory and has a decent camera and quite slim

Overall it’s not a bad phone for the price will run all the Usual apps that most people use. A decent camera an all the functionality that multi cameras off. Looks cool with a eye catching Colour an the battery life is excellent.
The phone is top notch easy to use and looks great comes with quite a few apps including Google pay nice.
Thanks, will recommended to a friend to buy a phone like this , is very nice and easy to use.
Surprised at the clarity of pics and easy to use. Highly recommended.
Not a bad phone for the price. Can't fault it.
Maybe not the most advanced on the market, but works well enough
Love this phone best one I’ve had.
Packed in after a fortnight. Can't take it back until local Argos opens after lockdown is lifted. Will have to buy a new phone elsewhere and get refund from Argos. Not very happy.
It's a good sized phone, bought for my elderly mother so the screen size is grest4
Excellent service and purchase made easy, good price too!

This phone is very good for the price. My intention is to use a second SIM for work as it saves having to use two separate phones. I've come up trumps with this model because the camera is very good, probably the best camera on a phone I've used.
Very  good mobile very happy
Very easy to use and not to heavy for the pocket. Value for money and battery power is good definitely recommend this phone
Good phone speaker is a little quite if your watching things but that's not what I use the phone for what I do use it for works great
My very first phone ( years ago) was a Nokia, it’s not confusing as some mobiles, easy to use and get value for the money.
Really pleased with my Nokia 5.3mobile phone.easy to use colour great and very light in weight.Rests nice in your hand.Like the big screen and good clear colour.Takes excellent photos.

Phone was great quality for the price I paid, 
Does everything I need it to do,
Was easy to transfer data form my old phone and
Takes great photos.
Chose this phone because of the price and unlike some other makes doesn't have unwanted in house apps that take up memory.

The phone is a purchase for my wife

Came in very compact box which is great to prevent waste and also came with a screen cover that will prevent the wife scratching the phone.

Massive leap for my wife who was very impressed with the camera and the speed at which the phone runs (compared to last phone)
The phone is difficult to set up but once past that , it really is a cracking phone , I would of gave it 5 stars if it was easier to set up.but honestly dont let that put u off.

It was hard work at first trying to pair as not everything paired also all the things you have to sign in. The way you use it was different to Samsung but eventually l am getting used to which way to swipe.
This is a great phone and is fantastic value for money. It's does everything that I want it to and is just as good as the more expensive phones on the market.
I looked at a lot of mobile phones before I purchased this model .I found price great. Compared to other suppliers. Very convenient to purchase goods .with the unprecedented times.

What can I say other than I'm highly delighted with the purchase of this Nokia 5.3, I'll be honest before I buy anything especially hi tek items I study and study and I'll admit it takes me a fair old while reading through other users thoughts on such items. I read the experts opinions a must anyway it runs on Android 10 it's a Android 1 phone I will get two years of satisfaction from security updates and updates in general that'll do me.
Very nice phone with a battery second to known.

Bought this to replace an older Samsung because of it’s much larger memory. Great screen size, good battery life, does everything I need. Pity no earphones supplied, as you need them to use the FM radio function, but other than that, it is great
very good price, really liked the screen size, the layout of the apps on the phone, easy to operate and extremely simple to operate

Great for first android phone I’ve ever had 
No fonts about it
Really good phone easy to handle when you get used to it
Better than I expected. Reviews weren't praising the display or macro camera, but at the price on Argos I can't fault it.
The Nokia 5.3 is a vast improvement on my last phone and the click and collect from Argos was fantastic.
Phone looks good, charcoal grey, didn't get a colour choice. Happy now.
great value and phone
Easy to set up and use

The screen sometimes sticks & to get out you have to restart. The home page (no button but have to swipe up) is awkward to find at times. The wifi pickup is not as strong as previous phones I've had. Nice looking phone though but could be soooo much better. Also got no reply from the nokia website when sent query.
Lovely low budget product and more so great customer service, thank you!:)

Got this for my wife as replacement for troublesome Samsung, had Nokia years ago , good feel to phone screen quality good , good battery life , gets a bit of getting used to swipe action to go back to main menu etc ... overall not a bad phone , good value for money.

Nokia 5.3 gives me most of things I wanted at quarter of price of other phones. Brilliant value, nice colour, good battery, fast charge. Clear cover & glass screen protector only a fiver! And Android 10!
Great price easy to use for someone who is not to tech savy

A good looking phone which was easy to set up and transfer data.
Easy to use and holds 1 mini and 2 micro cards. You can even use two numbers. Love it.

I brought this phone to replace the previous Nokia 5 I had for over 3 years. I am a Nokia fan so always think they are well made and have dropped quite a few times and no problems. It's Android so no Matter what brand it does the same thing.
The phone is generally good, the fingerprint is a bit slow, and the pictures are not excellent, but is a good buy for the price.
This phone keeps making screen go black and not sure why, was hoping something good from Nokia but at mo disappointed
Good phone for a kid. Has enough space for games.
It would of been nice if came with phone cover just in you drop the phone
Great value for money. Superb camera,

Purchased 2-3wks ago, so early days, but I have more confidence in this Nokia than in my two previous smartphones.  Acceptable size and weight, seems really fast working, easy to set up though not everything transferred across from my previous Android 6 phone.  So far, everything is encouraging.  I hoped for a different country of build, but it is the usual.
Will it live up to the reputation of the previous Nokia's I used for a long time years ago?  …  I really hope so, but only time will tell.

Bought my Nokia 5.3 to replace my old phone that was also a Nokia (Nokia 3), that had given me a good period of trouble free use. The 5.3 is very similar in design and operation, with a few differences that have been relatively some to master. It has a nice large screen, I use maps and this sure helps when navigating, I also link it to my vehicle as a sat nav it works fantastically. All round it's a decent phone, and does exactly as I had hoped, at fraction of the price some providers charge!.

Thought I'd treat myself to a new phone but worst choice I've made the phone has a mind of it's own! Constantly freezing or will jump from app to app, it only charges some of the time, the camera isn't to bad but not the best of you need to voom in on anything. I'd take it back but once you've opened the box you can't so I'm stuck with it and had to buy another phone as I need something reliable with being a carer which this is far from
Does feel on the cheap side with the plastic back but still a good phone.
Quality phone for the price you pay!!!

I am really pleased with this phone. It looks good, works well and doesn't need charging too often. My partner has a top of the range phone costing a few hundred pounds more and thinks this one is just as good.
Brought for my child's first phone and we are happy with it. Large screen for games is great. Also strong glass. Child is happy, so would recommend.
Price was excellent , the phone looks good is a good size and good weight

My opinion of the mobile is amazing. It was easy using your website nand also delivery before I even expected it. Brilliant service.
Thank you
Easy to use phone exchanges all your information for you
perfect collection at store; friendly efficient staff; mobile exactly what I wanted without paying the earth1
If you're looking for a best phone, then you've got a lot of it. Easy to use. Good quality of camera photos.

Nokia 5.3 - This is my first smartphone so I can't say how it compares with others. 
Chosen for: dual SIM, NFC for contactless payments. 
Pros: Voice transmission considerably clearer than 2G phone it replaces. Camera better than my 10-year old Samsung camera. 
Cons: too slippery to hold comfortably without a textured flexible cover (add £7). Screen doesn't rotate 180 degrees so can't be used with charging cable at top of sceen. Google Assistant button (I don't use. Disable in Settings).
works really well. easy to set up, was easy to transfer apps etc from old phone to this one. very happy with phone

For the money it’s a good phone.
I only use my phone for Facebook, WhatsApp, calls, emails and texting so it’s a great for me.
If you want a better camera then obviously you’d need a more expensive buy!
Bought as quick cheap replacement. Pleased with purchase

I did buy this phone but returned it after 10 days. Argos staff were excellent with the return and money refunded quickly. This is probably the worst mobile I've owned, constantly lost internet even right next to modem. I used more data in the days I had it than I do for a month normally as I pick up internet in my home because I'm retired. I must say the camera was excellent.
This is an excellent phone at a very reasonable price
Ideal phone for what I need

It's a good device, fast performance and with a slick design, good memory and storage capacity. Wasn't very happy to have to update it before using it (1.5gb of android system updates) but that's a minor issue, I think. Battery as expected.
This tablet was a Christmas gift for my dad. He loves it, and has managed to use it easily , great price too.
Excellent value for money and served with a smile! So much more competitive than other suppliers
Service was good and efficient.
There arte problems, but it works okay
Just love this phone ..great looking in this cyan colour & has so many fab features to it ..best buy for sure  ...Love my new phone ...Thanks Argos
This is a great value for money phone easy to set up and even a fat fingered techno phobe like myself manged it. looks cool too.
Nice phone and solid for the price, does everything it needs to and has a decent screen on it.
Saw reviews on YouTube and  everything that was said  was spot on one of best phones I have had especially for the price can't fault it at all
The product, price was brilliant, affordable as my brand does more or similar to the top brands..well done Nokia for keeping sustainability and affordability.
Good deal. I've bought the phone for my son. His phone looks better than mine, lol. Big screen, easy to use. Highly recommended for teenagers and not only
Battery charge is great

Great phone, I had an iPhone previously and decided I wanted a change, this phone does exactly what I need it to do and cost a fraction of the price, it works well, battery is good, but I use my phone a lot so doesn't last as long. On the whole a great phone
Great phone which is a good size. Love the green. Camera good
Has amazing features for the price range, a great camera and looks really nice. Thoroughly recommend this mobile!
Easy to set up and use . good camera.

It was easy to setup especially if your not mobile phone savvy but I found it easy to use when it was all setup. Only one thing that I would recommend which I have been told is with a big majority of phones nowadays maybe an easy setup manual for people that are not savvy with them
Everything I wanted it to be
nokia pnone 5.3 good phone very good price

Decided to move away from Apple and so far, managing OK with this phone, I'm not totally convinced the sound quality on the phone is always as good but it was pretty easy to set up and I'm not phased about getting used to it - highly recommend for the price
Put sim card in, connect to your network & off you go. Nice budget smartphone.
I'm very happy with this phone.  Plenty of memory, an extra sim slot too.  The camera is a super camera and I'll have fun learning the features.

Delivered earlier than promised ! Always a great start. Being a newly retired user and not exactly tech-savvy, I have found my way around this phone quite easily and can't wait to utilise 4 cameras when my travels beyond Covid will commence.
It honestly a great phone as it said the battery last two days I believe it 3 days as I don't need to put my phone in charge as much as I used too with my old phones I had in the passed

Great phone that's very easy to set up and very easy to use; it navigates very smoothly. I have compared it to other more expensive phones in the same category and it can't be beaten. The screen size is spot on for email reading, article reading or for watching videos.
Love it, love it, love it.

Had doubts, but turned out so wrong..Bright clear screen,  Very response, great cameras, awesome finger print opening Lock Screen.fast charging. very very pleased with product.. Excellent for price, well made and robust.. :) 10/10

Good value and fast delivery
Easy to use
Very good phone fast and good picture
I bought this to replace my very old nokia simple to use does everything I need live the colour it was a good price I would buy nokia again .
Is like a boster high speed

The phone does everything I want from it.  The battery life so far is very good.  The service from Argos was also excellent - the phone arrived really quickly and the email offering further technical assistance if needed was also a good safety net to have!
Really good budget phone works really good

i needed to replace my old phone, and so far im loving this!

battery lasts me 3-4 days between charges, screen is amazing quality.
very little bloatware in regards to software, build quality is great feels very solid in hand.

i would recommend this to someone looking for a budget phone with alot of features!
Excellent phone for me who is not technically minded easy to use and a great orice
Good value product - safe and efficient purchase.
Good phone, battery great, easy to work.
Easy to set up and use. Great camera. Great value for money.
Beautiful & unusual colour it works fine as expected but had a lot of trouble finding how to use back button. But once you get the hang of it. It was all smooth.

Not a bad phone with stock Android. Don't expect something top of the range with this phone. It does everything I need for a phone: calls, text, email , browse the web and the odd couple of apps I use.

Large screen easy to see and great for watching video. Easy set up with great features.
Lots of choices to personalise the phone. Easily as good as our family’s IPhones.
My Nokia 5.3 is fab. I bought it to replace my old phone. I am enjoying the apps and the general perfomance
The phone restared 15 times within an hour - looking on other sites this seems to be a common issue with Nokia. The phone was unusable, despite being fully charged and fully patched.
In this range of lower cost smart phones it will take a lot of beating
so much better than my sony  Xperia.glad i took the plunge.well done nokia
It's better than a Samsung

Have bought this model for my teenage son who is very happy with the phone, with no negative comments. Nokia are also one of the more ethical companies making smartphones for those customers who are interested in that aspect.
Absolutely great smartphone at a budget price. The camera is awesome and the android system is flawless
Good hardware for the price. Works well, is reasonably quick and it does the job.
It's a great phone,  nice smooth polished feel to it.
Big screen,loads fast . Plenty of memory.really pleased.

I've had this phone for a few weeks now & I have not had any problems with it. I found it easy to set up & use, it also provides me with everything that I need a phone to do for me. The battery is long-lasting, I'm not a heavy user but I do play games every day yet the battery lasts me about 2 days.

I bought this phone just to use duel sim. I have other flagship high end phone but after using this phone I find this phone is far better than other similar android phone above all this is cheaper than those phones. All the features specifications and hardwares are good in comparison with those similar android phones. After all father of mobile phone is back again.

I got this as a Christmas gift for my mother (although it was more of a gift to me to stop her complaining about her previous phone!). Phones from reliable brands like Nokia have become good, highly capable and best of all, cheaper. For someone like mam, (who isn't the most... digitally capable) this phone is more than powerful enough. It allows her to run features like the camera, whatsapp, outlook and Chrome easily. It is also has guarenteed updates for the next couple of years. Recommended.
The phone was reasonable priced for the specification and works very well and has all the apps and features you need.
Very good easy to use
Bough for my daughter for xmas loves it does everything she need highly recommends this phone
We got this for our son he loves it. It does everything he wants including downloading games

I have used this phone for about 6 weeks now and have found it to be great. I am not a heavy user, and the battery easily lasts for 2-3 days. The phone is responsive and easy to use. For the price, it is a great buy.

Lot of phone for the money
Does everything it needs to

Don't have any Don'ts 
Am more than pleased with my phone 
The camera on it takes great photos 
And the battery last a long time

The phone itself is realy good and everything works well. I just hate all the google apps. Uninstalled or Disabled most of them and replaced with non google apps. Can't understand why google will not let me Uninstall or Disable their FM radio app. Why? I do not and will not ever use it.
the phone has a long battery life, setting up instructions was a bit hard but all done, now working great.

I purchased this phone for a friend as his old one no longer supported GPS, I had looked at other phones but I decided on this one as it ticked all the boxes, the price at time of purchase was fair.
The screen is oh so smooth and the phone starts up really fast,setting the phone was very easy from the cloud,everything worked first time of asking, the camera's are of a good quality and the battery life is excellent,video playback is very good and I would say it's a really for you to consider.
Great product for anyone looking for a phone even for children
Nokia 5.3 64gb finding it very easy to use in the past had Motorola phones now gone back to Nokia's glad I have
Purchased as an upgrade on my old Nokia phone , pleased with performance , screen size and picture quality
Bought for my ten year old granddaughter and was ideal for her as it was easy to navigate around. It does everything needed for a smart phone of that price
Great phone bought for daughters Christmas present and she's not put it down since
Exceptional value compared to the mainstream brands, and so far, the phone has done everything expected and has not left me wishing I'd spent nearly ten times more on an equivalent sized Apple phone.
Nice phone,well built. No complaints!
This was Ideal Christmas present for the wife and so easy to order on line . So safe on collection from shop.

Great all round phone. Only lost a star as labelled as cyan but recieved a black in the cyan packaging not just 
once but twice. Gave up in the end and kept the black as it was collection from one store but return to another.
This phone is really easy to set up and use, it’s really trendy looking and the camera is really good!
Julst a very great phone
Great basic phone, good value.
excellent value for money

It's a great phone and easy to use and get used to.
The memory is great especially if you use your phone more for games.
Battery life is great however if you use it a lot for gaming then it would need charging at least once a day otherwise it'll last about 2 days

Works fine for basic usage of browsing, YouTube, phone, etc... Not tried any games, so not sure how it would handle that. Rear camera is decent, front camera less so. Sound is OK, a bit poor at low volume. Screen fine and notch is small and unobtrusive. Quite a big phone. Good value for money overall, but not outstanding. Nokia good at security updates though and it is a proper dual SIM phone with another space for an SD card.
Thanks for exelent purchase.
Nice phone and reasonably priced

Using my Nokia 5.3 phone to write this review. Have owned it several weeks now and chose it for its memory size, Android 1 operating system and price. There are not too many 64GB phones in the price range and being Android 1 it comes free of bloat ware with guaranteed software updates and a version enhancements.
Does everything I need so far and am happy with this choice of low cost phone.

Worst phone ever purchased. Worked well for 2 weeks then suddenly started randomly restarting itself and freezing/crashing apps . Appears to be a common problem when you search it. Avoid at all costs !
Generous spec for this price, just right for my use. Still trying to find out how to go back when browsing and could have more colour choice.

Very tall and falls out of my pocket too easily. looks nice. Screen shattered on week two when it fell out of my pocket from about two foot high. another review also stated quality of screen poor and had broken too easily. Cant take a reverse photo now.

This is a phone for my 12 year old daughter. We got it as an exchange from a Motorola E6 plus which broke under warranty. The Nokia 5.3 is better in every respect, especially battery life where it excels. 
My daughter is very pleased with it
Amazing phone. Better than my previous expensive ones.

This is my secondary phone for personal use as I want to keep my business matters separate.  I wanted a decent amount of memory, a decent screen and a lack of bloatware from the dominant manufacturers.  This is an Android One phone that guarantees it's as near to plain vanilla as possible.

One gripe - the Nokia tune on bootup!  You can't turn it off!  That doesn't really fulfill the promise of stock Android.  Manufacturers shouldn't push their brand like that.
Who needs an expensive iPhone when this android does all what I need.
Bought as a present for my wife. She seems very happy with it.
Easy to use and very good value for money
I was pleased with the size and weight and fitted my hand well and made fingerprint easy to use.
I think Nokia are making a great comeback with this phone. It does all the things the more expensive phones do. It's sim free, so it's great if you want to go with a sim only contract.

Very good price for the quality of the phone.

Easy to set up and use 

Fab battery life and Brill camera
My first Nokia. It seems to fulfill expectations  so far.

Previously had Samsungs so this was a change. Very simple to get used to..infact, instantly easy to navigate. Love the fingerprint opening. Very nice phone, holds charge well and takes nice pics. I mainly use phone to search Google, shop and check emails and instagram. If this is the usual price range you go for then this phone won't disappoint.

Frequent app crashes
Software Issues. 
Screen locks when making a phone call
Battery life is 1.5 days when using battery saver
Sound quality is very poor issues with speaker people can’t hear me
Fingerprint and face unlock does not work
Camera quality is poor
I realise this is a budget phone but it has too many glitches for my liking!
I have to return the Nokia 5.3 it’s not good. Very disappointing!
Stylish phone with excellent battery life

Amazing value. Signal strength is excellent.
Screen vivid and bright.

Arrived on time,easy set up and easy to use, will never pay top prices again for
a phone. Does all that I need.

I was a bit unsure about this phone as it's classes as a Budget phone but it's  Great phone, easy to use, does not look like a budget phone the Cyan colour is lovely. The camera is amazing, Nokia have always been known for good cameras but this is better than the Nokia 7.1 Camera. It also has a micro camera so great for close up's, no need to take glasses shopping anymore just use the camera!

I was looking for a phone for my wife after her phone screen broke and found this phone on Argos and bought it as a gift for her birthday. She is happy with the phone and features, only thing this phone lacks is picture quality of the camera.

This phone not only looks good but everything about it is fantastic. It has the latest Android 10 operating system and has a superb camera. It has everything I need in a mobile and was such a great price. I would not hesitate in recommending it to anyone.
easy to set up and use, great camera
I cannot give a a fair review as it was faulty  and had to return it,decided not to risk getting another one
This phone has everything you need, reasonably priced, simple to set up.
Very pleased with my new phone easy to use ,big screen ,takes great photos.
Like I put does as it says value for money , easy to use
Vibrating mode did not work nightmare to get a exchange
Love my new phone only thing is I think the battery could last longer

Love this Nokia Phone, very easy to use, brilliant colour and design , the battery life last longer and has everything I need in a phone ,and a great price, I have always bought   a Nokia Phone , just up dated it all the time , .
Excellent phone for the price as good as phones costing ten times the price

Great phone and a great return for Nokia. Very affordable, great design and size. 
The camera is fantastic, battery life is good and charges quickly.
If I was to give any negative feedback it would be the standard ringtones and notifications are a bit dated and rather 'old skool'. 
Overall, it's a great phone and would recommend.

This is the second Nokia phone I have owned and I am not disappointed. For what it costs this is a superb phone. It is very easy to use and for what I do the battery lasts at least two days, sometimes three. Everything is intuitive which is a refreshing change for me.
Only thing that makes you notice the lower spec is watching video other than this a fantastic phone. Why pay hundreds more no need.!!
Very good phone, quick and good camera and battery

A great phone for everyday tasks.

The lock-screen facial and fingerprint recognition seem reliable.

There are no unnecessary pre-installed apps hogging the storage space, leaving more room for the software you want.

I have always been a top fan of nokia phones there the best the battery life quality is fabulous the phone is just lovely in every way one good thing i was pleased about it was it still as the nokia ring tone which was a blast from the past. The colour is lovely ive had so many comments from people i highly recomend the phone its so easy to use and the wallpaers on the phone are wicked best ive seen all in all this phone is excellent 10 out of 10 for looks performance and ease of use love it
I am very happy with my Nokia 5.3 64 GB phone.

The phone has excellent features great graphics and a really good camera well
Worth the money

Works well, is fast.

I don't know about battery life but can safely assume it should be good enough
This is a present for my brother but when my husband saw the phone he went and bought himself one as well.
Excellent phone value for the money
All I can say is brilliant camera is better than my Samsung I had  Thanks .
Not a bad phone at all ,if you're looking for a cheap phone this does the trick ,I tried the cheaper Nokia 2.4 but no power at all but this one is great well impressed for the price
Great phone at a great price better than the much more expensive ones
Does a lot that a premium phone would do at the price of a budget phone.

Fab phone. Did my research before I brought it. For the price I can't fault it. Camera may not be as good as the high end phones but the rest is fab. It's fast with a big clear screen. Does everything you need it to
Amazing phone, will be buying another for my partner.
Mainly used for keeping up with the news both on the internet and with friends using  mainly texts and the occasional call.
no complaints does everything a more expensive phone does with updates available for 3 years being andriod one

Not a frequent phone user, but I wanted something that would work much faster than the old phone. This certainly fills the bill. Certain amount of relearning required as usual with modern technology, but most actions are fairly intuitive.
I really recommend this phone.
You'll struggle to find a better phone at this price. It has a large screen, it's fast and the battery lasts ages. I bought this for my wife and she's very happy with it.

Thought I’d give Nokia a try wish I’d have gone for a A21s. 
Maybe I was unlucky, occasionally  screen glitches and opens apps without even being touched, also keyboard types on its own so it requires turning off and then is fine for a few hrs? Nice large screen but sadly no one handed mode. Gesture navigation not always responsive, had to go with a 3rd party launcher to get my desired text size. Better phones out there for the price.
Looks good, great battery life, takes good photos.  Good price for a known brand. What’s not to like .
Nice, light phone however the battery doesn't last long! Apart from that very happy.
easy to set up and transfer my apps from my old lg phone
The phone recieved was excellent. It was worth the money and a perfect gift to give. Battery is good and so is performance. Lover it.

The phone  is excellent in all features since I started using it. No regret that I got another Nokia. With 48mp camera. Nfc. Bluetooth. GPS. WiFi. Tethering. I found it very valuable as there is nothing else to look for in any smart phone. The only issues is the battery only last 24hrs before you just have to recharge for next day. Otherwise I will have rate it 5 star for all features. It super in performance fast. Better than most iPhone and latest smart phones. Cheaper Good value for money.

Good product from reliable company.
Easy to use.
Android updates a bonus

Second one I've bought both the wife and I have one Buick easy to use fantastic battery life does everything our old mobiles did only better. Will never go back to a galaxy or a huwei . Only draw back not got top name yet recommend try it you'll love it.

Nokia was my first mobile phone 
This phone is looking good also its modern technology
Good reviews on YouTube and great price online made my mind up.
It is execllent and I save a lot £££ for the same spec as another well brand name.   so why pay over £400. for a Sam or I for a well know brand returning on the market.
I bought this for my wife she is well pleased, as her old phone broke and this is the next model. Does everything and more than she expected

Colour is lovely, camera is very good has great focus. I'm usually LG but because most are discontinued and not coming out to the UK I chose this one. Has same or slight better camera views and clear pictures as the LG. Happy with my choice. Would recommend this.
I bought this phone recently, I'm very happy it's a nice upgrade, charges fast, battery life is excellent, camera is great. Extremely happy with my purchase.
the software feels a little like an iPhone, the HD camera is pretty good but the battery life could be a little better. still worth the 150 all in all I am happy with it.
Just as good as any 'leading' brand, great camera, light and so easy to use.
The phone is of good value. GBP 150 for 64GB with fastest CPU among the same grade of phones.

I purchased this phone because I dropped my Nokia 7.2 and broke the screen I've since had it replaced but like this phone so I'm still using it at the moment I think Nokia phones a fantastic and this month's great for the price well worth the money
Does everything it said it could. Soon got used to where everything was and how to operate. Battery life good, lasts a few days.
Reasonably priced, camera seems good. Runs all the apps I need it to.

Having smashed my old phone I opted for this Nokia and think I've made the right choice. I'm not very tech savvy but the styling is great,I got the cyan backed phone which really stands out and looks fab,the screen is nice and bright and super sensitive to touch,which can get a little annoying , It has all the features I need and some I don't,I don't really use the camera but the photos I've taken seem to be worthy of a much more expensive phone/camera. Ups, lots. Downs, none so far.
I highly recommend this product
This mobile phone just selfie’s camera has problems , is not good for what’s up application

I bought this as a replacement phone for my partner. She loves it. It is easy to navigate and excellent quality.

I wI'll be getting this for my next phone.

Perfect for all needs

It was a great phone but every time we turned off data (to only use WiFi) it would turn it back on again which got pretty expensive. We took it to 02 and they didn’t know why it would do that so couldn’t help. We ended up taking it back and getting a different brand.
Read reviews and decided to buy, so far living up to my expectations, impressed with battery life!
Battery power really useful. Greater capacity for storing pictures. Ease of operation. All good
Phone is slim has a great camera and is easy to use

For the price this is a great phone. It looks stylish. I went for the greenish/bluish colour, and with the graduated colour along the curved back this catches the eye. Everybody is asking me "What phone is that?" Nokia, really??
The screen is bright, great colours, big. The features are great, fingerprint sensor, face recognition, amazing battery life, NFC for contactless payments. The phone is responsive, little or no delay when asking it to open apps and games.
Would definitely recommend!
Very good value highly recommended.
A bit bigger than I expected but OK. Plenty of memory. Good camera. Easy to St up. Good features for a great price.
Love this phone so easy to use and has a great battery life. Very clear screen and camera.

I did research before and the phone has not disappointed.
Would strongly recommend to others.
Easy to use great features what you would expect from nokia
Great size screen, easy to use,great battery life.

i needed a very cheap but very fast and reliable work phone... this nokia has so far been better than my s10+!! it is so fast, quick and responsive. so smooth and easy to use. I am so glad i chose this as my business phone.
Great phone for the price,easy ordering online to collect in store.
Great phone, easy to get used to,

This is a great phone-- bought for my wife after her flip phone finally broke. Long battery life and plenty of features and with a good storage capacity at 64gb. Good value for money and highly recommended.

Pros: large screen but still fits in my pocket, a slim phone, lovely colour [green/blue], good battery, charges quickly, great sound, 2 sims & micro sd card slots, user friendly. 

Cons: if you are accident prone / tend to drop things I highly recommend a decent phone cover for more grip, can't remove the Google search bar from the home screen [which bothered me as I never use it], gets warm with use.
Solid phone keep away from water and it's perfect

A very average phone, yes it is a cheap budget phone but it isn't very good. Battery life and design are best aspects of this phone. With a large battery it lasts a long time and performance is decent too. What let's it down are the washed out screen with pale colours. And the cameras are just awful, even using HDR the images just come out very dark all the time.

I purchased this phone as it was a good brand as recommended by Ethical Consumer magazine. There are a couple of things that bug me a bit about it though, and I am not sure I would try the brand again. The phone makes the most awfully loud chime noise when switching on, which is not needed at all, so I set it for bedtime mode and then the time I wake up is still covered by it, so it does not chime. The camera does not have a built in QR reader which is madness, and notifications can be sketchy
So far I’m very pleased. It seems to do everything I expect from a phone, and Ikm very impressed with the battery life.
Great phone at a great price. I personally think this does everything an iPhone does at a budget price. Got all the latest processor etc.

Pros:
- Huge screen.
- Massive battery (lasts about 2 days).
- Runs apps smoothly and fast.
- Expandable memory.
- 3.5mm headphone port.
- In the right conditions it takes good photos.
- Feels well made and nice in the hand.
- Contactless payments.
- Dual SIM.
- Cyan looks cool. 

Cons:
- Camera sometimes struggles to focus, 
 particularly in low light conditions.
- No fast charging.
- Sound could be better.
It does what I want for a reasonable price.
Lovely phone, large for bad eyes easy touse
Excellent mobile for price, good camera with good battery life. Good features and no bloatware.

Replaced old Nokia as battery life and limited 16 GB memory meaning I could not use all the apps I need for my hectic lifestyle..has all the features of a good  iPhone without the price tag..battery lasting over 2 days with lots of use ..very pleased and 64 gig memory means deleting apps is a thing of the past.google pay ,face recognition, and fingerprint unlock all standard and a doddle to setup if you have a Google account.if you already have a Nokia phone it copies everything over for you.
Great phone easy to use and good battery life  looks good too

This is a great phone for the price. Screen size is perfect , battery life very good , not overloaded with apps. Fairly easy set up but great one to one support from the online help service should you need it. I found adding a custom ring tone difficult. Internet connection very fast . Very happy with my purchase , in fact my husband has now bought one !!
Would recommend a clear plastic case (Amazon) as it is very slippy in the hand and I was worried it might slip and break .

The phone is on a large side. The selfie camera is a bit grainy when on a video call and worse compared to what it was on my old phone (what I heard from the people I spoke to).  But it seems ok when taking selfies. Another thing is that I seem to have more 'dead' spots around the house where I lose my network than before. I haven't changed network provider but the phone. In general I'd recommend it for a budget buyer.
Easy to use and transfer everything from my old phone would recomend
Great phone without all the bloatware of more expensive rivals
Sleek design nice features yes I would recommend this Nokia phone.
Sharp photos and plenty of processing power and good battery life.

Great phone. Perfect for my needs
Would highly recommend
I’m not really a technical wiz but this phone is very easy to use and get the grips off... very reasonable price and it is a lovely design..:
Very pleased with my purchase which replaces a more expensive famous brand ,it has a  clear screen, excellent battery life all at a very affordable price

Really pleased with this phone.
Big on features, small on price.
This phone does everything you'd expect from one costing double the price.
Looks good, performs well, couldn't wish for better.
Very good quality phone at a great price
LOCKED ME OUT AFTER SO MANY WEEKS

Really great phone, looks good and brilliant battery life. 
More user friendly than the Samsung I had prior, and no issues with streaming apps (Netflix, Disney+) that I've had with other phones.
Excellent budget smart phone with all mod-cons, good battery life and 4 cameras, only annoyance us the Google assistance button but if you use that option anyway it's fine
Absolutely delighted with the design, colour, features and quality.

I bought this as a replacement for a faulty Nokia 2.3 and I think the extra money was worth it. The camera is excellent and the battery life means you can go all day without worrying about charging or carrying battery packs. The 64GB memory means I can have all the apps I need without having to spend time clearing up space. Its maybe a little bit bigger than Id like, but fits in pocket fine.
Fantastic quick downloads loads of features, excellent picture quality and many more features
only thing i could complain about is a 'fuzzyness' of the sound sometimes. other than that is good
Love the easy to use functions and the larger screen (compared to my previous phone). Would highly recommend.

A replacement to Samsung Note 8. Good size screen, Android One and amazing battery life.

The cameras are not sharp, worst if in the dark. The "smart features" are not as intuitive as the Note 8. This Nokia does not have any IP rating, so don't go near to any water.

If you are using this Nokia as a phone, YouTube, browsing the internet, then you will have no problem at all. But if you are into gaming, then this may not be the right phone as the spec can't handle some of the high end games.
Bought for my husbands birthday.  For the price it's a fab phone.  Looks up to date and fresh and I was genuinely surprised at how stylish it looked.  Complete value for money and would recommend.

Worked just as fast as the old samsung s9 it replaced. Camera quality is excellent, battery life and storage both phenomenal.

This was a purchase for my 13 year old sine, who was really happy with it, however after 10 days it started to loop on and off and wouldn't get passed the android screen.
The mobile does not work properly and Argos does not want change it. Never more I will buy something on this shop.
Does everything you can ask for at a price that does  break the bank.
We bought this as a 21st present for our son and he loves it, he said it's got a great battery life and is really pleased with the amount of memory.

Got this and it was returned the following day. Indoors on a bright sunny day and even put living room light on after first test was no good. The camera was focus popping a lot. Take it outside and worked fine.
No good whatsoever inside
Decent enough looking phone but cameras junk. 
Got a used iPhone 8 for only two hundred from elsewhere with twenty four months warranty
It's fine. Works ok. Nothing bad I can think of.
Typical Nokia always class.

Hi

I purchased this Nokia 5.3 as l previously had a Nokia 5.1, l find the dual SIM very helpful as l use my phone for personal & work related matters, 64 GB internal storage is twice the size as the previous phone, external memory card upto 512GB so plenty of space if needed, battery life being average, decent apps & camera, it suits my requirements accordingly.

Regards

Mark
Great buy reasonably priced fast delivery dose what is says on the tin. Very happy with it

Brought has a replacement for hauwi android 10.
This Nokia is same android 10 but has Google search with voice and Google assist button and apps not on hauwi. 
Great to see Nokia making making great phone with features good has more expensive ones great camera fast browsing 
much more recommended to buy
Bought for my teenage daughter, has all the features you need, fast to load, good camera, stylish and really clear screen.
Glad to see Nokia back into the smart phone market. Cracking mobile at a great price. Glad to have a mobile without all the pre installed manufacturer apps, just Android & Google. Happy days.

For the  money it seems a good quality phone , colour is great ,apps are the same as my Samsung 50 and works and looks similar,only problem is connecting blue tooth to download music doesn't seem to want to connect to another phone ,but it does everything I need it to do pay bills ect .
Great phone with amazing battery life, screen and a good camera. Can have 2 Sims and 1 micro SD card in also. Better than most phones unless your spending 1K.
Really good for the price

This phone is different to what I had before, getting used to it now, but its like everything you buy now a days you dont get a manual to help .Get it online and print your own. But it was a good price for what it does, will find out more when i download the manuel.
A far better phone than the apple iPhone

Great choice of phone..... excellent spec ......alot better than my old Samsung phone..... can't fault the Nokia 5.3 in any way........ excellent phone for price paid.....I'm impressed.....so far so good...

This is a great phone for the price. Smart and quite compact. Very responsive screen and incredibly easy to set up and use. 

The battery lasts a lot longer than I expected. I am very pleased with the purchase.

Android One on a Nokia phone runs clean and smooth and updated itself to the latest system and security settings immediately. Battery life is at least 2 days, often 3 days. Out of curiosity I tried the Support app built into the phone and got an online chat with a human being, able to offer help and advice almost immediately. What other brand offers that?
Auto brightness can fluctuate without warning which is annoying. Apparently it's an Android 10 issue but turning it off solved the problem.
It's a very good phone, long battery life, features easy to understand. Good value for money

If you want to make calls, send texts, use WhatsApp and take a few photos then you will do well to find a better phone at the price. Being a Nokia phone it comes with the latest version of Android so it might be a little different from your old phone but you will soon bet used to it.
Very pleased with the purchase.
very.easy.to.work.great.value.
the amazing part is, the light turns down automatic when not in use to save battery. and it lasts for more than two days.
This phone was well worth the money easy to sent up and easy too use good camara on it too. Would recommend it for anyone.

My first review ever.. this phone is absolute rubbish! 
Keeps switching data on by itself, I switch it off (in developer options too) but it switches it back on again, eating up all my data.
Also screen brightness keeps randomly dropping down to 9percent while I'm using it meaning I've got to stop what I'm doing and go into settings to turn brightness back up again.
Just a very annoying phone!
It's nice phone for the price
Brought this cause my old done never seemed to have a signal even at home I would recommend this product
Very food product.  !
I needed a new phone as my existing phone was playing up, very pleased with this one great battery life and good camera and storage
Bought this as a present for my friend and he loved it

Great looking phone in cyan (it's blue, not green as the website insists on telling you) . Smooth, fast and reliable. Performance (IMHO) is as good as many phones costing 2 or 3 times the price. Could be better screen/camera/speaker, but dual SIM AND SD slot at this price is amazing. WiFi calling (if your provider supports it) is another bonus. Bought to replace an ageing Moto G5+ (home) and a Samsung Galaxy (work). Now carrying 1 phone instead of 2. Thoroughly recommended.

Screen size is very good. Quality of the camera and the hardware is pretty good for the price. Design is also great. I would say that at this price you can't go wrong, it can compete with mid ranged phones easy. Never had any issues so far. 

The only one down side is that it doesn't have a back button, I know many people using Android are used to having a back button. But we can get used to it.
Very good phone well worth the money
Bought as a cheap replacement for my crashed expensive android the Nokia a brilliant phone very impressed with it would certainly keep to a Nokia in future
Good looking phone with a  long lasting battery and Android 10 operating system.  Very good value compared to similar Samsung phones etc
The phone is nice and lightweight and a nice Sharp picture and it has a nice sound, i would recommend this phone.
Excellent price for alot of phone,
I bought this for my daughter as a birthday present. She is very pleased with the phone and loves the colour.
Very fast.easy to use

First Nokia phone. The screen is larger than I would like but most new phones are like this. The display is fine for my use. The only issue I have the phone is that it is proving difficult to answer a normal phone call. I swipe up, down sides ways and still I continue to miss calls. Hope this is just me and I find a way to answer calls promptly. The one thing that should be easy is using the phone as a phone ,never mind all the fancy bits of a smart phone. Other than this issue all seems ok.

Good camera
Works well, has all the features of a modern smart phone.
The turquoise is really nice.
Battery doesn't last for 2 days but not far off, and when it gets to 10% it drops really quickly
i would tell others to purchase this phone has it is easy to use and battery life is good on it well worth the money
My first smartphone. Fairly easy to set up and use. I'm happy with the product.

Really pleased with this phone - does all I need and more. Always used Nokia, I don't see the point of paying hundreds more for something that does exactly the same. Love it! Great service from Argos as well, brilliant price and prompt delivery, my go to shop first nowadays as cannot fault them. Thanks Argos!
Not a bad phone, I swapped this for my Motorola which was outstanding on battery effeciency, a little disappointed. Very nice phone though.
I got this Nokia as other phone was playing up very pleased with it very nice features and easy to use
Looks good and is right for me. Very happy with it.

Great size 
Beautiful shape 
Great battery life 
Don'ts none
Love this phone the design is great also easy to use

My iPhone would no longer hold a charge so it was time for a change. This Android Nokia 5.3 is brilliant, has everything I need and more. Battery life is excellent, operating system and user interface is intuitive and easy to understand for new Android users. Haven't put the camera to much use, but it seems good so far. 
Recommended.
Welcome back Nokia!
Best android at this price with dual sim facility and extra expandable memory.
Posted and received quickly.  Features are many.  Photos are great.
Good amount of memory and a good sized screen have enjoyed viewing my fave apps on it. Would recommend for a budget phone and does not need to be charged too often.

I like the colour of the phone. It has more features than my old one, but lacking in some that were useful in my last phone. Be prepared for Nokia to surprise you. They have put more into it, but reduced it's features at the same time. Awesome.
The Nokia 5.3 in Cyan is a excellent mobile phone for the price with lots of different features. Transferring my data from my Old Motorola phone was very easy to complete
Phone has stock android and was easy to setup and use. For the price it's a v good phone. Face unlock and finger print sensor work well.
Very happy with the Nokia 5.3
Great phone with good battery life

Price is very good for the quality of the phone and cheap respect other website.Fast delivery. The phone work good , is fast, a lot of memory space and very good the battery. Just little disappointed about quality of pictures, but can fix downloaded a good app.

Everything works great, no lag when opening apps etc. Looks good. Battery life ok, lasts all day.
Would definitely recommend if you're looking for a good phone at a good price.
I bought Nokia 5.3 Cyan for my Wife as a Wedding Anniversary gift. Amazing features. User friendly. Battery is brilliant. Improved Camera. My Wife love this mobile.

Always loved Nokia phones but bought the 4.2 last year and had nothing but bother with it..
So was a bit apprehensive about getting another but thought I’d give them the benefit of the doubt and glad I did.
The 5.3 is perfect for my needs, great phone for the price.

watched loads of phone review videos online, anything below 4 ram can be slow, this is 4 ram fast enough, camera is ok for normal use, good apps and features, movies good crisp picture. Nokia done well here, well worth it 4.6 for me out 5
I like it. Nokias are great for ease of use and battery life.
Brilliant device - looks great and performs brilliantly

This is really a great phone, the phone is really speedy, calls, camera and messaging all very good.

I think the size of the phone is great especially in a case (I have joint pain) is easy to hold it feels great to hold in the hand.
Absolutely no problem recommending this phone absolutely superb.
Thank you
Really good value. Runs android one which is a efficient stock android and has no manufacturer junk apps. It's the future! Phone size may be too big for some.
good price very happy with purchase

Great phone. Love the assistant and saves a lot of time writing the search. Compared to my old phone the operating system is fast. The storage is huge for my needs. The 2 year updates to Android and the fact it runs on Android 10 is fab. It is ready for Android 11. Swiping for all functions is simple and easy. Finger print scanner for unlocking phone is poor. However yet to look at it. Great value and highly recommend.
This does have perfect features and would totally recommend.
Muito bom produtos compra esse produto
I decide change my handset. Good quality in good price. For me most important is call and using communicators and camera. All function working very good

this Nokia 5.3 is a replacement for Nokia 5 and is a really nice upgrade, physically bigger it just feels so nice to hold, very slick new features including swipes for navigating and closing apps, just feels natural.
I think it's the best option if you'r looking for a phone under £150. It comes with Android one and you alway get the latest updates

I wanted to replace an old pay as you go phone and chose a Nokia 5.3, I just wanted a smart phone which could receive e-mails etc. not interested in watching games/films on it. It so far does everything I want from it. It was a choice between a Galaxy and the Nokia either would have done the job.
Really pleased with this phone. Plenty of storage, latest Android version, good, easy to use camera, what's not not to like and at a very reasonable price.
I am really glad I did bought this phone . Verry nice and excellent to use .

Excellent phone for the money nice big screen.  Decent battery life lasts me the day and I have many open apps running all the time.  Decent volume on the ring speaker phone function it clear and loud can hear well when using this function. S teen is clear and the camera is very good

This phone as all the features you would want and the camera is also excellent.
The click and collection worked well and email for proof of purchase too

It's a grate phone very responsive and easy too use, the battery life is brilliant for a smart phone, my partner has replaced her old phone with an identical one after seeing/ using this one. Can't say more then that.
Stunning, very easy to use.

This is a replacement phone and I decided to go back to Nokia for a change.  This phone is really fast and the interface is a very pleasing and uncluttered Android without all the company add on that other tend to put on.  Glad I made the swap to Nokia.  In fact my partner has already bought the same model!!
Quite fast and responsive, better than the Nokia 2.3 which it replaced. Battery life ok, would have been better with 5000ma.

Great phone. 
I'm happy with it

Great phone, amazing battery life, it can be a bit slow but nothing to bad. The camera is decent enough, not great but it would do the job. Clean software experience, being a Android one device. The look of the phone is nice, I got the dark green colour, but you can feel the build quality in your hand, which is not bad but you can just feel is plastic. The phone can cope even with games like Asphalt 9, COD mobile. And you put everything in balance with the price this is best buy on a low budget.

Fab phone dose the job for
Movies
Games
Social media
Great camera 
Great video capture
Love this phone my partner has the same and thinking about next phone for kids

Glad Nokia have decided to ditch windows in favour of Android as they always made excellent phones. 
1. Android 10 
2. Part of Android One program - with 2 year updates guaranteed; no bloatware here!
3. Very smooth operation - down to excellent chip-set(Snapdragon 665) and Ram (4Gb)
4. Huge 64Gb storage - expandable with MicroSD
4. Very clear screen with Gorilla Glass (less breakages)
5. Very good camera with depth perception available

i got this for my stepson who broke his nokia 6.2. this, while seeming to be more budget friendly was still an upgrade in specs except for the screen whish is still fine. my son is impressed & since this, my stepdaughter has also bought one as the deal is so good from argos at the moment. all in all a nice looking phone with all the needed features such as nfc etc.

I've had this phone for a few weeks now and I love it. I haven't had any issues and it works as it should. The only downside I've found is that the camera is not amazing, but for the price I wouldn't expect much better. A big plus is that the battery lasts really long.
Plenty of storage and upgraded to Android 10 soon as I started using it. Ideal for me as I only use mail, browsing and Whatsapp with the occasional phone call on PAYG.
You should be fine if You will keep running this path.
it works. That is good. It is a phone. Looks nice. It was a fair price.

It looks fab and love the sleek design. Good battery health but would love to have a bit more features though you can download most of the features now a days. I am a big Nokia fan and love to see Nokia making a come back.

Easy to use, large screen plenty of memory. Battery lasts a good 36-48hrs.
Great value for money
nice phone, easy to use, good price

I wanted a phone that was fairly quick, had good battery life, was not bloated with unnecessary software and cost less than £150 and the Nokia 5.3 ticked all the boxes. It also comes with a guaranteed 2 years of Android updates. Brilliant phone, love it!
The phone is good it does the job the only down side is that there is no zoom in feature on the camera which is a tad annoying.
Wife is pleased with it, makes me happy, easy to use good battery life latest updates I would recommend this phone
Looks pretty good and performs well. There may be sound quality issues during some conversations
I don’t get on with iPhones this phone is ideal for me

Phone is ok, but nothing great. Very fragile, it fell once and it's already cracked in one corner.
I hate how you have to swipe from the right or left edge of the screen to "go back to the previous screen" you were in, as it keeps doing it whenever you touch close to the edge, which is almost impossible not to do in some games/websites.
More than happy with it as I bought it going off reviews that I'd read

Transferring contacts from old phone was almost completely automatic, very impressed. Display is great and generally a nice phone to use, everything works well and plenty of storage built in, with option to expand easily and inexpensively. Preferable to iphone, latest Android OS does everything I need and much better value.

I got this as an upgrade from the Nokia 5.1. Massive improvements on some features but others that I prefer with the original, like the back button has gone and it's now a swipe action.
Battery life easily two days, camera is brilliant. Screen has a slight curve at the edge so glass protector is not suitable.
Definitely good phone for the money
It is a good phone, I like the camera and battery life. Only drawback is it is hard to go backwards and forwards between screens.
Pure Android experience on a budget phone. Great camera, battery life. True value for money. Nokia Brand.
Fab mobile, very pleased with the features and cost

It's a nice looking phone and once I get the hang of it I will probably love it. What I did not love was to see it now reduced by £20 just a month after I bought it and have only just been able to get it working with a new sim card and some wizardry from a lady at the local Tesco phone shop as my existing card did not fit into the flimsy plastic drawer in the side of the Nokia phone.
fast and good call quality. Instructions could be better
excellent phone for everyday use. down side is finger print sensor is on the back of the phone so makes it virtually unusable if you are using the phone in a phone case.
Honestly think this is superior to the Motorola's I've had b4 just thought I'd try the old faithful Nokia and it hasn't disappointed!
im happy with my new phone used to have a nokia years ago so am happy they have bought this one out and is updated
A BRILLIANT WEE PHONE FOR THE MONEY NOKIA HAVE DEFO GOT IT TOGETHER I HAVE THE 7.2 ALSO AND THE 5.3 IS JUST AS GOOD SUPERB
A decent phone, great camera, not so suited for old folk as a first smart phone
Nice phone for very good price.
Nice phone good response and good battery only disapointment was Argos dropping the price two days after i bought mine by £20.00
Great phone, full of features and fast spec. The camera isn't great but I own s camera so no big thing for me. With Android one you are guaranteed at least two years support.
Really good phone, battery lasts for ages and picture quality is really good.

I've been using phone for two weeks without any problems. 
When i unboxed the phone it was easy to start up and transfer contacts via Google. The cyan colour looks good. The phone is responsive and fast when using apps and internet. Screen is clear and good size. The camera is better than I expected, the main camera takes good pictures, the wide angle and night time setting also achieve good results. But the macro lens not do good.
I brought this, but changed mind.
Absolutely love this phone impressed with features very quick response love the quad camera especially the depth can get all the apps I previously needed different phone for

Very slow transfer of data from existing phone.
Still have not fathomed all the uses and there was no manual with the product
I would highly recommend this phone. The performance, sound and graphics are amazing.

By far my best value mobile phone yet. Perfect balance of features, performance, size and price. This is our fourth Nokia mobile phone in 20 years and is an excellent example of how far the Finnish company has advanced in that time.
Great phone with two years of updates.
Nokia phone is really value for money, battery Life is exceptionally good...Easy to use and navigate...
It's great value for money
Decent phone for the money. Screen is large which is great for games and movies
Little awkward to connect phone to WiFi due to android 10, software.
I am impressed with this phone. In fact second one in family purchased
For the price of the phone it does everything I require.
I am blessed to have found my Nokia 5.3 on the Argos website at such a time. I am benefiting greatly from a small investment. It's absolutely fantastic.

There's nothing about this phone that I don't like. The colour is nice and unisex. It has a large screen that's really clear. The camera is fantastic, even has a macro lens for taking close up pics of wildlife which I love
Excellent phone with plenty of features and an exceptionaly reasonable price tag.

This Nokia phone is a delight to use. It has a large internal memory and supports a very large external memory. I have installed 256g external memory and to boost the 64g internal memory. I cannot be happier to have this phone because the phone takes quality pictures so I can explore nature with confidence of taking more photos. The battery lasts long too.

If like me you're not prepared to spend money on big contracts and expensive phones, I'm sure you'll like the Nokia 5.3.

Good camera, slick operating system with guaranteed Google updates for two years, 64gb is plenty.

I normally get Motorola phones as they are great budget phones too, but opted for Nokia for NFC which Motorola doesn't have. So between the two this one has the better connectivity option.

I think the latest Nokia's are great value for money. 
This was an upgrade from my Nokia 5 with more of everything, screen, memory, battery, lenses, etc.
Happy....
It's a little taller than I'd prefer, but I got used to it quick. It's fast and doesn't feel like there was any compromise despite being mid-way between the older and newer Nokias.
Good phone and very good service
Nokia is a nice phone

This phone was picked for me by my son and grandson, as I am a bit of a technophobe. It does everything I need and more. They said it was quite easy to set up, one thing I find is that the battery doesn't last as long as said. Saying that I do more things on it that I didn't do on my last phone. It does last a day though, perhaps I am being a bit unfair.

Been using this device for a few weeks now and it's great! Was a little scared as I've had an unpleasant experience a few years ago with an inexpensive Android device but this is very performant (for what I'm doing, which is basic usage [Pokemon Go])
grandaughter loves it
Love a good simple design
I can say  my phone was very cheap and best

Having had problems with other makes of budget smartphones recently I thought that I would give the good old Nokia brand a chance. 
My 5.3 has happily surpassed all of my expectations so far, especially the battery life.
 Easy to use and understand, with the latest operating system, lightweight and bright, fast and sensitive, with easily available accessories too.
What is there not to like?
Great phone love it thanks very much

i had high hopes going back to Nokia using an android os but its not as good as it could have been
most of what you would expect from android is there but a few features that ive had with other android phones are not there and the os is not as fast as it could be

all in all not bad but not up there with the best
The battery life is exceptional I can get 3 days out of one charge, suits me well.  Great phone for the money
The phone is cheap for the price. A very good camera for selfie. I love it

It's been a long time since I bought a Nokia phone. However, this phone represents a fantastic return to form from the company. It has a fantastic battery life that can last over 2 days without charging (even with moderate use), a set of 5 incredible cameras (I've attached some pics taken on the Nokia 5.3) and has the same hardware specs as more expensive phones. The phone itself can open and run apps very quickly with clear visuals on it's spacious screen. 5/5 for an all-round excellent phone.
This is my second Nokia smartphone. Good features for the price especially with NFC included. Running pure Android without unwanted apps and receiving regular updates from Nokia. Would recommend.

Love the new phone still getting used to it.i have been using a Samsung but wanted a change.i had Nokia's when I was younger and loved the phones. Since using Nokia 5.3 I can tell I needed an upgrade and so far I am not disappointed. Love the style and design the memory is great.camera has 13mp which is all I need.glad with my desicion so far thank you

I bought this handset as a cheapy in-between model as my previous handset was lost
I thought this would be durable and get the job done for few months.

The battery life is great and it looks good for the price but that's where the pros end.
It struggles with video calls, games seem to lag and struggle to load

The screen cracked after falling out of my pocket whilst I was on my knees (1ft) not what I was expecting from Nokia. 

In short, I wouldn't sell this to my worst enemies
Very nice, good value

I like the look of the phone, screen, great battery, etc. I chose Nokia because they are sturdy. This is a back up phone. Some features e.g. the camera could be better in terms of the colours.  Some apps that come as standard e.g. voice recorder need downloading otherwise ok. I will keep the phone - it does what it needs to do. My other phone an Honor 10 - to which this is a back up - is too delicate and if the glass breaks one more time it goes in the bin and the Nokia takes it's place. :-)

Really pleased with this phone, battery life can last over 3 days, the memory is ample to install numerous apps plus you can install a micro SD card to store pictures and videos. It is a dual SIM phone and both Sims are active at the same time you just set a preferred SIM for mobile data usage. The only slight gripe is the fingerprint reader sometimes does not respond first time.
Excellent quality. Looks good. Feels good. Clear and responsive screen. Clear good quality sound. Long battery life even under heavy usage. Camera works well, both front and rear.

This is a great phone for the money. It's very quick and responsive and very user-friendly. It's running on the latest Android 10 and guaranteed to upgrade to Android 11 etc. The camera and video is spot on. It's got a nice bright screen which fits nicely in your hand and lightweight compared to my old phone. It's great to have 64gb of on board storage. Happy.

i bought this phone for my daughter. she is very happy with it this is a well built phone from an established manufacturer .the main reason for buying is of course its excellent value for money.comes with android 10 operating system plus 2 years updates .good camera/good screen resolution not bad internet speed.has same functions as more expensive phones do.best phone in its class.
Good phone for regular use.

great phone the screen is amazing it all works well 
some things are different the way you use screen etc but getting used to it 
all in all a good phone
So far I have no issue with the issue

Easy ordering online and collect the item next day from the store.
Great phone with lots of features, 4 cameras, 64gb storage. Fast responsive touch screen with excellent battery life. 
Easy to use android 10 operating system with available updates.

This was a positive choice, and has proven to be a good find!   I have to sat the size and feel is fantastic, and it is easy to navigate and get used to!    I have found nothing negative to date, and I definitely recommend this phone.
Got for dad, battery life great, easy enough to set up and good big screen. A lot better than apple as can use different apps. Camera Is good also. Great that’s it’s sim free no hassle

This phone is definitely worth the money. After receiving the delivery which was excellent service.
This phone with the guaranteed Android updates and is very easy to use.
Battery charger is brilliant always getting about 2 days out of this phone.
A great phone for the price paid, easy to set up and use. only reason i gave it 4/5 for features, is because i haven't had a chance to use/try all the features as yet, but very pleased so far
I`m new to Android so am getting used to it.Works really well and quickly. Excellent battery life.

This phone is massively let down by it's fingerprint reader and face unlock, it just doesn't work properly. I've never known a fingerprint reader to be this bad. The phone also jams up frequently it's very annoying. This is my first modern Nokia purchase and it will be my last. This is a definitely a budget phone and nowhere near as good as a Motorola.

This is a great phone which even after a full days use, still has about 50-60% battery life left at night with its 4000mAh battery. It is well built with a bright screen, 64Mb of storage, which can be expanded, NFC for contactless payments and near stock android, so no bloatware. It should also come with 3 yrs of monthly security updates and 2 OS updates, which will take it to Android 11 and 12 in the future. Easy to use and feels comfortable in the hand for a device with a 6.55 screen.

GOOD PHONE AT A SENSIBLE PRICE. AS IT IS NEW IT IS YET TO BE FULLY PUT THROUGH IT,S PACES BUT IT SETS UP EASILY AND HAS A BIT WEIGHT ABOUT IT WHICH.I THINK. IS ONE SIGN OF BETTER QUALITY. NOKIA IS A SOUND BRAND AND THIS PHONE HAS THE BENEFIT OF FREE UPDATES FOR TWO YEARS. I RECOMMEND THE NOKIA 5.3 AS A SOUND AND SAFE PURCHASE.
the phone is to big screen is to big
